bayern.cost_adjustments: 15-20% higher AKU costs, premium veterinary services
bayern.process_notes: Stricter examination standards for high-value horses
bayern.market_context: Traditional breeding regions with established procedures

niedersachsen.process_notes: Efficient examination processes, high volume handling
niedersachsen.market_context: Horse trade center with experienced professionals

nrw.cost_adjustments: Urban premium for limited specialized veterinarians
nrw.process_notes: Focus on recreational horse suitability assessments

meta_descriptions.pillar: Alles über AKU Pferd: Kosten, Ablauf, Klassen. Professioneller Leitfaden zur Ankaufsuntersuchung mit Expertenberatung von PferdeWert.de
